value.title: Specifying multiple filter conditions in CALCULATE

value.title: Count of Unique Values DistinctCount in Power BI Through Power Query Group By Transformation
value.excerpt: You can have a distinct count calculation in multiple places in Power BI, through DAX code, using the Visual's aggregation on a field, or even in Power Query. value.title: Sort a Column with a Custom Order in Power BI
value.excerpt: I have previously written about how to sort a column by another column, and I used Month Names as an example.
